commit_message: End Session 00: Eye chamber freeze + boons + LATEST log + aspect fix
description: Freeze canon at the Saarthal Eye Chamber (pre-withdrawal). Fix scene aspect note-mixup (Right Key vs Ward Reforged). Formalize the Eye siphon SWS boon as a PC Extra (charges). Create *_LATEST.md log and append END SESSION block. Record patch file for audit trail.

changes.reason: Freeze canon at A1_S01_SAARTHAL_WITHDRAWAL; fix Right Key / Ward Reforged aspect notes mixup; set end_session_protocol_ran timestamp.

NOTE: campaign_state.json scene_clocks uses a separate 4-segment high-level overview version of this clock (currently 3/4 â€” eye chamber reached; segment 4 = secure exit + return report is the next scene).

Add Eye of Magnus discovery to major_events; add Saarthal rumor; add end-session note.
